page.title: 08RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: There are few recreational facilities available in the block and inhabitants of the area must travel to larger towns for recreation. The nearest picture houses and theatres are at Yeovil which is 7 miles away. Sherborne the nearest town has thriving amateur dramatic socities, concerts of classical music which are often held in the Abbey and a newly acquired Theatre owned by the Boys Public School and which hosts travelling theatre companies. Facilities for young people are extremely limited with some villages big enough running youth clubs and discos. Sporting facilities are owned by the Boys Public School at Sherborne and include a very good swimming pool, gymnasium and squash courts, all of which are open to the public at set times.
